name: Pumpkin Game_Test01
description:
Pumpkin Bully Game - Code and concept by Aude Jomini at FEED.

For Halloween Game workshop at Barnard Vagelos CSC with Saima Akhtar.

Background map by Eben Kling, using Mana Seed tilesets by Seliel the Shaper.   Pickups by  Eben Kling.   Character by Mythril Age.   Monsters by sprngr.  Thanks to all the makers.
